title: Disgraced mum Karen Matthews plans to escape limelight by fleeing abroad to start a new life in SPAIN
text:
Opinion RUNNING FROM HER PAST Disgraced mum Karen Matthews plans to escape limelight by fleeing abroad to start a new life in SPAIN 
Despised mum-of-seven Matthews is looking for a move after being abused in the street Exclusive Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments KAREN Matthews has applied for a passport after telling a pal she’s planning to flee Britain for a new life in Spain. 
The kidnapper had wanted to go live in Spain after being released from prison in 2012 but was barred by probation bosses. News Group Newspapers Ltd Karen Matthews was jailed for eight years for her part in faking the kidnap of her daughter, Shannon in 2008 News Group Newspapers Ltd 5 Disgraced Karen now wants to flee to Spain following abuse for her role in the kidnap of her daughter Shannon 
She was still on licence for four years following her being freed half-way through her eight-year jail term. 
That licence has now expired and she’s free to travel abroad and last night a friend revealed she was looking at start again in the sun. 
The source revealed: “She knows she can never avoid her past and with this new drama programme on the telly she’s realised that living abroad might be a better option for her.” related stories MONSTER'S MATE Julie Bushby led the search for Karen Matthews' missing daughter - but the truth left her horrified A COLD CASE Here's everything you need to know about episode two of Shannon Matthews drama, The Moorside SHANNON BOOK DEAL 'Kidnapped' Shannon Matthews offered tell-all book deal to heap more shame on mum Karen ROTTEN TO THE CORE Karen Matthews in constant pain from 'black decaying' teeth after choc and sweets diet while in jail for kidnap of daughter Shannon 'CONSPIRACY OF SILENCE' Karen Matthews' pal insists evil mum wasn't 'smart enough' to mastermind kidnap plot 
The source added: “She can probably get a job out there and enjoy a better life than always looking over her shoulder. She’s applied for a passport now and that’s the first step towards leaving the UK for good.” 
The show, starring Sheridan Smith as Matthews’ duped pal Julie Bushby, is on BBC tonight. PA:Press Association 5 Shannon Matthews was found tethered and drugged inside the base of a double bed at relative Michael Donovan’s grotty flat almost a month after she disappeared 
The mum-of-seven held talks with probation officers about spending six months of the year on the coast on the Costa Blanca following her release but they banned the plan. 
The source added: “She argued that she could live there out-of-season when there wouldn’t be so many Brits about. She said she could get a cleaning job and a small flat to rent and would feel far safer than in some town in England. 
“She said there are lots of holiday complexes out there where people own second homes and apartments and so there would be a ready supply of cleaning jobs. 
“This is what she is now looking at trying to put in place again.” News Group Newspapers Ltd Karen – who made public appeals to find Shannon during her ‘disappearance’– wanted to go live in Spain after being released from prison in 2012 Sky News
